Interface TriangleMesh

All Known Implementing Classes:
TriangleMeshCloudFlat, TriangleMeshCloudPlanet, TriangleMeshTerrain, TriangleMeshTerrainFlat, TriangleMeshTerrainPlanet
public interface TriangleMesh

The interface that meshes must implement

subdivide

void subdivide(int subdivisions,
               int flatSubdivisions,
               XYZ variation)
Perform a number of subdivisions, possibly some unperturbed ("flat"), and halving the perturbation variation each iteration.

Parameters:
subdivisions - The number of subdivisions to do in total
flatSubdivisions - The number of subdivisions to do with no peturbation
variation - The amount of initial variation to be applyed by peturbation

Returns:
The correct colour index for the triangles (0 or 1)
